topic.title: Layout
topic.shortdesc: A simple one-page layout for the portfolio to ensure ease of use and a uniform experience.

ul.li: Separate each section with a title
Inlcude a persisting 'back to top' button
Make the navagation bar easy to access while scrolling thorugh the page.
